__e: In the meantime, could I have a cup of coffee?

Could I possibly have a glass of beer?

Do you mind getting me some more coffee?
Could I, could I have the, uh, same room, my, my sister had?

Does anyone know what the problem could I have?
But how can I let you leave... when it is I who is the the cause of your misfortune?

- Would you show me to my room, please?
